actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to commend the 1st Infantry Division (Mechanized) for their outstanding performance during Operations Desert Shield and Desert Storm.

summary.text: Commends: (1) all of the soldiers of the 1st Infantry Division for their outstanding devotion to duty, professionalism, and courage under fire throughout Operations Desert Shield and Desert Storm, and (2) Major General Thomas G. Rhame, his staff, and all the commanders and leaders for their superb command, brilliant tactical employment of forces, and outstanding leadership of the "Big Red One."

titles.title: A resolution to commend the 1st Infantry Division (Mechanized) for their outstanding performance during Operations Desert Shield and Desert Storm.
